block_comment: This block of code manages the write calibration final check "wrcal_final_chk" based on certain conditions. Upon a rising edge of clock "clk", if a reset "rst" is detected, the output of the block "wrcal_final_chk" is set to 0 with a delay of "TCQ" time units. If a reset is not detected, but instead if in the next state the write calibration is active "init_next_state == INIT_WRCAL_ACT" and either write calibration is done "wrcal_done" or the Calibration is skipped "SKIP_CALIB==TRUE" and the DRAM Type is DDR3, "wrcal_final_chk" is set to 1 after a delay of "TCQ" time units.
